title: The Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/8/21
itunes:title: The Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/8/21
description:
George Noory and author Michael Mabee explore his efforts into strengthening the nation's power grid from terror attacks or electromagnetic pulses, which could lead to catastrophic death and destruction if the infrastructure breaks down.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
